antichess
Class AntichessBoard

java.lang.Object
  antichess.Board<ChessMove>
      antichess.ChessBoard
          antichess.AntichessBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class AntichessBoard
extends ChessBoard
implements Cloneable

Extension of a ChessBoard with board-level moves modified for Antichess.

Adds the additional functionality over ChessBoards of checking if the player has won by having his opponent capture all of his pieces, and disallowing moves if they do not capture any piece while some other possible move does.

AntichessBoard also adds one more public end-game condition, AntichessBoard.OUTOFPIECES (value = 3), to that set from ChessBoard.
